com.biit.form.runner.logger

Class FormRunnerLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biit.logger.BiitLogger

  • public class FormRunnerLogger
extends com.biit.logger.BiitLogger
    Defines basic log behavior. Uses log4j.properties.
